summary: This is an email chain from June 28, 2019, discussing the logistics of shipping approximately 23 boxes of evidence from FBI case files to Virginia. The emails involve FBI personnel and federal prosecutors coordinating the transfer of case records related to the investigation.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: Appears to be coordinating the shipment of evidence boxes from New York to Virginia and inquiring about the plan for handling the evidence.

persons.name: Assistant U.S. Attorney
persons.context: Identified as a prosecutor working on the investigation, providing contact information and confirming the contents of the evidence boxes being shipped.

connections.description: Coordinating the shipment and handling of evidence boxes for the investigation, as shown in their email correspondence.

events.title: Coordination of Evidence Shipment
events.description: Email discussions regarding the plan to ship approximately 23 boxes of evidence from FBI case files to Virginia.

keyFacts: The document references the shipment of approximately 23 boxes of evidence related to FBI case files 72-MM-113327 and 31E-MM-108062.
The email chain involves coordination between FBI personnel and federal prosecutors regarding evidence handling.
The evidence includes approximately two boxes from FBI case file 72-MM-113327 and the remainder from FBI case file 31E-MM-108062.
The correspondence emphasizes the urgency and importance of the evidence transfer, with requests for updates as soon as the boxes ship.
